text: Si Aayeeje Amen ɓannguɗe ɗen janngaamma e maɓɓe, ɓe wi'a: "Oo wonaali, si wanaa gorko faalaaɗo falagol on e ko baabiraaɓe mon rewayno rewaynoo".
